caption.p: Effect of annealing two complementary strands on the peak oxidative current (A) adenine in a mixture of ssDNA (5′-AGTAGTAGTAGTAG-3′) and adenine in annealed two complementary ssDNA (5′-AGTAGTAGTAGTAG-3′ and 5′-CTACTACTACTACT-3′) ( n = 3, p < 0.001, two-tailed and unpaired t-test) and (B) guanine in a mixture of ssDNA and guanine in annealed two complementary ssDNA ( n = 3, p = 0.0021, two-tailed and unpaired t-test).
